thread.title: Microsoft Updates Facebook App for Windows Phone
thread.title_full: Microsoft Updates Facebook App for Windows Phone - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Microsoft Updates Facebook App for Windows Phone
text: Microsoft has just released an update for its own Facebook client for Windows Phone, but just like usual, the company hasn't provided any kind of information regarding the new features in this build. Facebook hasn't developed its own official client that would run on Windows Phone, so Microsoft decided to take care of the matter on its own and provide users of its smartphone platform with an unofficial version of the app that works and feels pretty much like the real one. ... Â»
